data.text:
Publish date: 2024-07-23

Who is Christina Pickles?

British actor Christina Pickles is best known for playing Nurse Helen Rosenthal in the NBC medical drama St. Elsewhere. She is an actress who is nominated for an Emmy. Check out the bio to learn more about Christina Picklesâs wiki, biography, age, height, weight, husband, children, body measurements, net worth, family, and career, among many other facts.

What is the Net Worth of Christina Pickles? Salary, Earnings

Her primary source of income is acting. As of 2021, her net worth is predicted to be between $3 million and $4 million.

How tall is Christina Pickles? Weight, Hair Color

She is 1.65 m, or 5 feet 5 inches, tall, 165 cm. She is about 55 kg (121 lbs) in weight. She has blonde hair and stunning dark brown eyes. Her body is 36-27-43 inches in size. She is a 36 DD bra cup size.

Quick Facts

Real NameChristina PicklesNick NameChristinaFamous AsActorAge86-years oldBirthdayFebruary 17, 1935BirthplaceEnglandZodiac SignAquariusEthnicityMixedNationalityBritishSexualityStraightReligionChristianityHeightapprox. 5 ft 5 in (1.65 m)Weightapprox. 55 KgBody Measurementsapprox. 36-27-43 inchesBra Cup Size36 DDShoe Size6.5 (US)Eye ColorDark BrownBoyfriend/DatingNoHusbandVictor LoblChildrenNoNet Worth$3 million â $4 millionSource of IncomeActing CareerFavorite ColorOrangeFavorite FoodItalian Cuisine

Where was Christina Pickles born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Age of Christina Pickles: She was born on February 17, 1935. She is aged 86. Christina Pickles is of mixed heritage and has British nationality. She is an Aquarius by birth sign. Christina Pickles was a native of England. She is the daughter of Gladys Pickles and Arthur Pickles, a Liberal politician and Halifaxâs mayor.

She is the sister of judge James Pickles and the niece of radio host Wilfred Pickles. Carolyn Pickles, her niece, is also an actor.

Is Christina Pickles Single? Relationship

Christina Picklesâs husband is Victor Lobl, with whom he has been married for 23 years. The couple divorced in 1989.

From the middle of the 1980s until his passing in 1996, she had a love relationship with actor Herb Edelman, who also portrayed her significant other on St. Elsewhere. She also wed Australian-American journalist Ian Masters in 2005.

How did Christina Pickles start her Professional Career?

At the Arena Stage in Washington, DC, Christina Pickles made her acting debut in the 1961 production of Look Back in Anger.
